turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about OpenMarket.
turn.2: OpenMarket  OpenMarket Inc. is a privately owned subsidiary of Amdocs that provides cloud-based mobile messaging solutions to enterprises, including global one-way and two-way SMS, MMS, RCS, and short codes, local numbers and text-enabled toll-free messaging solutions.
turn.4: In June 2006 the company was acquired by Amdocs, Inc.
turn.6: The company is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, United States, with offices in Detroit, London, Sydney, Pune, and Guadalajara.
turn.8: OpenMarket began as part of Qpass, a technology company that specialized in providing the infrastructure for electronic payments.
turn.10: In February 2006, Qpass acquired Simplewire, a provider of mobile messaging, payments and other services, which began operations in 1999.
turn.12: In June 2006, Amdocs, Inc. acquired Qpass and separated the company into two divisions.
